Title: Prohibits industrial uses of products or substances containing perfluoroalkyl or polyfluoroalkyl substances
Summary: Prohibits the use in an industrial plant of any product or substance that contains perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances, including vats, conveyor belts, molds, ovens, pans, pots, chemicals used as mold releasers, lubricants, seals and coatings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting industrial uses of products or substances containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl
